entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow or rain. High plus 3.
